In this session we will be discussing from the 8th and 9th verses of the 17th chapter
of the first canto of Shri Madhavagavatam.
The 8th verse is as follows
Najatu Kauravendranam
Dordanda Parirambhite
Bhutale Anupatanti Asmin
Vinate Praninam Shuchaha
